title: Text selection in Academic Journal site is locked
content:
When visiting Springer's websites (and others), I cannot select any text using Firefox (but I can with Chrome). I cannot find the setting to modify to enable this ability (text selection).

I set: SmartBlock OFF (false) Proxy OFF

For example: https://actaneurocomms.biomedcentral.com/

can someone help me? Thank you in advance Maurizio
creator: ziomaurits

title: nightly won't open till i run install exe file
content: after reboot,my nightly shows only updating screen(small pop-up style one) amd won't actually run.this fixes everytime when i run nightly installer. refreshing&reinstall nightly didn't fixed anything while developer edition just runs fine

title: Sites Default to Wrong Account
content: Whenever I go onto a Microsoft website, I have a terrible (consistently mildly inconvenient) time signing in. For whatever reason, it always tries to sign in with my school account instead of my personal account, and I have to manually change to the account I actually want to use. I don't know why it keeps defaulting like this but it's very annoying, what can I do about it?
creator: andrefdeo
